flawed_nl_solution:
Jacob can eat 12 / 2 = <<12/2=6>>6 candies before crying.
Lana can eat 6 - 3 = <<6-3=3>>3 candies before crying.
Nellie, Jacob, and Lana all ate until they cried, so they ate 12 + 6 + 3 = <<12+6+3=12>>12 candies.
Thus, there are 30 - 12 = <<30-12=18>>18 candies left in the bucket.
After dividing the remaining candies equally, they will each get 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6>>6 sourball candies.
#### 6

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 21, not 12. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
